params.revealHash: Unhashed key used in a commit
params.tokenId: Token with `tokenId` to mint. Maps tokenId to individual item ids in ItemIds

commitKey(bytes32).details: Miner cannot guess key, user cannot get block hash (thats the idea)

initialize(address,address).details: One time use, these contracts must have their `owner` set to this address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revealKey(bytes32).details: Uses block hash and reveal hash for randomness

params.shadowlingId: If greater than start index, mints shadowling

sacrifice721(address,uint256,uint256).details: Sacrifice function for ERC721, must be approved beforehand

params.shadowlingId: If greater than start index, mints shadowling

params.amount: Amount of void minted per `token` burned
params.token: Address to update the cost value of

params.amount: Extra amount of void tokens received
params.token: Address to update the cost value of

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

returns._0: Amount of VOID minted from sacrificing `token` with `tokenId

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

BlockError().notice: Thrown if attempting to reveal in same block or 250 blocks too late

CommitError().notice: Thrown if a commit has already been revealed

CurrencyError().notice: Thrown on attempting to use incorrect currencyId

HashError().notice: Thrown if a hashed revealHash does not match the commit

InitializedError().notice: Thrown on attempting to set an already set `void`

ListedError().notice: Thrown on attempting to burn a non-whitelisted asset

RevealedError().notice: Thrown on revealing a committed hash

TokenError().notice: Thrown on attempting to use inccorect tokenId

ZeroError().notice: Thrown on passing a zero value as a parameter, you're welcome

Claimed(address,uint256).notice: Emitted on burning void tokens to claim a Shadowling

Modified(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted on modifying a Shadowling's attributes

RevealHash(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Emitted on revealing a committed hash key

Sacrificed(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Emitted on sacrifice and minting of VOID

SetBaseCost(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted on upating the base amount of void received from burning an nft

SetCurrencyCost(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted on setting the price of a currency usage in void tokens

SetPremiumCost(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Emitted on updating the premium amount of void received from burning an nft

Taken(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when an owner removes tokens

SHADOWLING_COST().notice: Void burned for conjuring a Shadowling

claim(uint256,bytes32).notice: Mints Shadowlings to `msg.sender`, cannot mint 0 tokenId

commitKey(bytes32).notice: Commits a hashed key to be revealed later

cost(address).notice: Cost of the NFT with `address`, denominated in VOID tokens

currencyCost(uint256).notice: Maps currencyIds to their respective Void token cost

getHash(bytes32).notice: Keccak256 hash of this contract's address and `keyHash`

initialize(address,address).notice: Sets the void token and shadowling contract addresses

modify(uint256,uint256,bytes32).notice: Modifies a Shadowling using with the `currencyId`, changing its attributes

premium(address,uint256).notice: Additional premium cost of an NFT with `tokenId`, denominated in VOID tokens

sacrifice1155(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Sacrifices `amount` of `token` with `tokenId` to the Shadowpakt, and receives VOID

sacrifice721(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Sacrifices `token` with `tokenId` to the Shadowpakt, and receives VOID

setBaseCost(address,uint256).notice: Update an `address` of an nft to be whitelisted to receive void on burn

setCurrencyCost(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the cost of using this currency, denominated in void tokens

setPremiumCost(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Sets an extra amount of void received from burning an nft with `tokenId`

takeMany(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Owner function to pull ERC1155 tokens from this contract for nefarious purposes

takeSingle(address,uint256).notice: Owner function to pull ERC721 tokens from this contract for nefarious purposes
